main.name: Reshma Ramesh
main.description: Astute IT professional highly skilled experience in Amazon Web services CLI/Console and cloud computing services, skilled DevOps engineer with knowledge on CI/CD pipeline for efficient deployment using AWS & Dockers. Over 5+ years of consulting experience in technological sector with effective technical skills ensuring customer satisfaction at top most priority
main.bio: I like to work a lot with computers and I am always curious about new technologies in the market. I have driven myself to be a deep-rooted learner. I like spending most of my time with my pet, I'm a Netflix series freak, a Picasso in the making and like to play to Cricket and go for a jog at times in the evening.
main.contactmessage: Buy me a coffee? or Let's talk!

resume.skillmessage: I showcase some of my skills where I'm really good at.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics - A three-time Gold Medalist
education.description: An important phase of my life where I developed my logical approach towards solving problems. Enhanced my hands-on experience with computer science and Electronics by eventually tunneling both to prepare my BE project successfully and pass it with distinction score.
Guzzled a strong foundation in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics i.e. the core subjects. I Had an immense learning experience and graduated with distinction in both the exams.
